How to diagnose Childhood Brain and Spinal Cord Tumors ?,"Tests that examine the brain and spinal cord are used to detect (find) childhood brain and spinal cord tumors. The following tests and procedures may be used:         -   Physical exam and history : An exam of the body to check ge
